welcome_message_body: Welcome to Faridabad, a vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and bustling markets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm and culture of this lively destination. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for low-cost carriers, with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi for up to 45 minutes after which they can purchase additional usage time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Delhi Hindon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Delhi Hindon Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
